Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #1:  

  Once you have their money, you never give it back.

    Deep Space Nine: "The Nagus", "Heart of Stone",
    Prodigy: "First Con-tact"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #3:

  Never spend more for an acquisition than you have to.

    Deep Space Nine: "The Maquis, Part II"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #6:

  Never allow family to stand in the way of opportunity.

    Deep Space Nine: "The Nagus",
		Enterprise: "Acquisition"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #7:

  Keep your ears open.

    Deep Space Nine: "In the Hands of the Prophets"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #8:

  Small print leads to large risk.

    Lower Decks: "Parth Ferengi's Heart Place"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #9:

  Opportunity plus instinct equals profit.

    Deep Space Nine: "The Storyteller",
		Lower Decks: "Hear All, Trust Nothing"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #10:

	Greed is eternal.

    Deep Space Nine: "Prophet Motive",
    Voyager: "False Profits"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #16:

  A deal is a deal.

    Deep Space Nine: "Melora"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #17:

  A contract is a contract is a contract... but only between Ferengi.

    Deep Space Nine: "Body Parts"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #18:

  A Ferengi without profit is no Ferengi at all.

    Deep Space Nine: "Heart of Stone", "Ferengi Love Songs"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #21:

  Never place friendship above profit.

    Deep Space Nine: "Rules of Acquisition",
    Prodigy: "First Con-tact"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #22:

  A wise man can hear profit in the wind.

    Deep Space Nine: "Rules of Acquisition",
    Voyager: "False Profits"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #23:

  Nothing is more important than your health... except for your money.

    Enterprise: "Acquisition"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #31:

  Never make fun of a Ferengi's mother.

    Deep Space Nine: "The Siege"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #33:

  It never hurts to suck up to the boss.

    Deep Space Nine: "Rules of Acquisition", "The Dogs of War"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #34:

  War is good for business.

    Deep Space Nine: "Destiny", "The Siege of AR-558"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #35:

  Peace is good for business.

    The Next Generation: "The Perfect Mate",
    Deep Space Nine: "Destiny"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #45:

  Expand or die.

    Enterprise: "Acquisition",
    Voyager: "False Profits"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #47:

  Don't trust a man wearing a better suit than your own.

    Deep Space Nine: "Rivals"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #48:

  The bigger the smile, the sharper the knife.

    Deep Space Nine: "Rules of Acquisition"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #57:

  Good customers are as rare as latinum. Treasure them.

    Deep Space Nine: "Armageddon Game"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #59:

  Free advice is seldom cheap.

    Deep Space Nine: "Rules of Acquisition"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #62:

  The riskier the road, the greater the profit.

    Deep Space Nine: 
      "Rules of Acquisition", 
      "Little Green Men", 
      "Business as Usual",
    Lower Decks: "Parth Ferengi's Heart Place"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #74:

  Knowledge equals profit.

    Voyager: "Inside Man"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #75:

  Home is where the heart is, but the stars are made of latinum.

    Deep Space Nine: "Civil Defense"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #76:

  Every once in a while, declare peace. 
  It confuses the hell out of your enemies.

    Deep Space Nine: "The Homecoming"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #91:

  Your boss is only worth what he pays you.

    Lower Decks: "Old Friends, New Planets"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #94:

  Females and finances don't mix. 	

    Deep Space Nine: "Ferengi Love Songs", "Profit and Lace"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #95:

  Expand or die.

    Voyager: "False Profits",
    Enterprise: "Acquisition"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #98:

  Every man has his price.

    Deep Space Nine: "In the Pale Moonlight"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #102:

  Nature decays, but latinum lasts forever.

    Deep Space Nine: "The Jem'Hadar"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #103:

  Sleep can interfere with...

    Deep Space Nine: "Rules of Acquisition"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #109:

  Dignity and an empty sack is worth the sack.

    Deep Space Nine: "Rivals"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #111:

  Treat people in your debt like family... exploit them.

    Deep Space Nine: "Past Tense, Part I", "The Darkness and the Light"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #112:

  Never have sex with the boss' sister. 	

    Deep Space Nine: "Playing God"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #125:

  You can't make a deal if you're dead.

    Deep Space Nine: "The Siege of AR-558"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #139:

  Wives serve, brothers inherit.

    Deep Space Nine: "Necessary Evil"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #168:

  Whisper your way to success.

    Deep Space Nine: "Treachery, Faith and the Great River"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #190:

  Hear all, trust nothing.

    Deep Space Nine: "Call to Arms"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #194:

  It's always good business to know about new customers 
  before they walk in your door.

    Deep Space Nine: "Whispers"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #203:

  New customers are like razor-toothed gree-worms. 
  They can be succulent, but sometimes they bite back.

    Deep Space Nine: "Little Green Men"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #208:

  Sometimes the only thing more dangerous than a question is an answer.

    Deep Space Nine: "Ferengi Love Songs",
    Prodigy: "First Con-tact"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #211:

  Employees are the rungs on the ladder of success. 
  Don't hesitate to step on them.

    Deep Space Nine: "Bar Association"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #214:

  Never begin a business negotiation on an empty stomach.

    Deep Space Nine: "The Maquis, Part I"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #217:

  You can't free a fish from water.

    Deep Space Nine: "Past Tense, Part I"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #223:

  Unknown, but presumably concerned the relationship between 
  "keeping busy" and "being successful".

    Deep Space Nine: "Profit and Loss"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #229:

  Latinum lasts longer than lust.

    Deep Space Nine: "Ferengi Love Songs"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #239:

  Never be afraid to mislabel a product.

    Deep Space Nine: "Body Parts"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #263:

  Never allow doubt to tarnish your lust for latinum.

    Deep Space Nine: "Bar Association"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #285:  

  No good deed ever goes unpunished.

    Deep Space Nine: "The Collaborator", "The Sound of Her Voice"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #286:

  When Morn leaves, it's all over.

    Deep Space Nine: "The House of Quark"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #289:  

  Shoot first, count profits later.

    Lower Decks: "Old Friends, New Planets"

Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #Unknown:  

  A man is only worth the sum of his possessions.

    Enterprise: "Acquisition"
